# rN2000 package
<!-- <a href='https://github.com/iiasa/rN2000'><img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right"height=140/></a> --->  

Tools for downloading, querying and processing European Union [Natura 2000](https://ec.europa.eu/environment/nature/natura2000/data/index_en.htm) datasets.

## Installation

Currently only as development version on GitHub

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("IIASA/rN2000")
```



## Usage

**In development !!!**

### Load package

```{r message=FALSE, results='hide', eval = FALSE}
library(rN2000)
```
